title: Joker Pornhub:Pornhub Sees Spike In Search For ‘Joker’ Following The Record-Breaking Debut Of Joaquin Phoenix’s Film
text:
What happens when the much-awaited movie hits the screen? People are in awe, social media to dining table discussions – all revolve around it, people search for more information about the movie on the internet etc, right?

But when Joaquin Phoenix’s masterpiece ‘Joker’ had hit the screens, some horny people, actually a lot of them, were searching for the porn version of it.

hdqwalls.com

No, we are not making this up. Porhub has reported a spike in searches for Joker after the Joaquin Phoenix starrer made a record-breaking debut.

“Our statisticians found that in just four days, searches containing 'Joker' reached 741K with a peak of 291K on October 6th. Bang!,” a statement from the website read.

Don't Miss 5 K SHARES 1.2 K SHARES 12.6 K SHARES 4 K SHARES

Twitter

Not just Porhhub, people at xHamster also witnessed a similar search pattern. According to them, there was more than a 1,300 percent increase. “People are now fantasising about the f***ing Joker. Human sexualisation is weird sometimes, but the Joker searches have risen over 1,300 percent, which is astounding,” a spokesperson said in a statement.

Meanwhile, there are crazy things happening at the screenings of Joker. While one man in New York was kicked out of the theatres for he was laughing and cheering when Joker would kill a character onscreen, in California, audiences fled after a suspicious man was surveying the audiences near the exit gate. There were several other weird things that have been happening at the Joker screenings.

Meanwhile, Joaquin Phoenix says he is open to doing a sequel of Joker and that it has endless opportunities. “I talked to Todd a lot about what else we might be able to do, in general, just to work together, but also specifically, if there’s something else we can do with Joker that might be interesting,” Phoenix was quoted as saying by IGN.

Do you want a sequel of Joker? Tell us about your thoughts in the comment section below.
description: But when Joaquin Phoenix’s masterpiece ‘Joker’ had hit the screens, some horny people, actually a lot of them, were searching for the porn version of it. No, we are not making this up. Porhub has reported a spike in searches for Joker after the Joaquin Phoenix starrer made a record-breaking debut.
